summary: Gives Imperial and Stormcloak quartermasters unique outfits.
descriptionHtml:
Gives Imperial and Stormcloak quartermasters unique outfits. This mod also makes the quartermasters respawn so an army camp will not be left sans quartermaster if he should be killed by a roving dragon (which always seems to happen).

This mod is compatible with pretty much anything that doesn't specifically modify the quartermaster actors, including [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27563/?]Wet and Cold[/url], which applies the hood in one of the screenshots, and popular faction mods (which don't modify the quartermasters).

This mod is safe to install/uninstall at any time, but if installing in the middle of a game, it might be necessary to respawn an actor to force the new outfit to appear (i.e. use the "resurrect" command if a quartermaster appears undressed).


My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42855/?]Lore-Worthy Bandits[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26450/?]Lore-Worthy Nettlebane[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27385/?]Lore-Worthy Hagravens[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30503/?]Lore-Worthy Movarths Boots[/url]
author: Team Value

files.name: LoreWorthQuartermastersSmiths
files.changelogHtml: Changed some town merchants to better match there allegiance.
